item.title: Beat Mazes with Reinforcement Learning
item.description: RL is a blooming field at the moment. In my opinion, it has the most potential to become a general AI. But the main idea behind RL is actually simple and straight forward. In this blog post letâ€™s build a RL agent that can beat randomly generated mazes to demonstrate this idea. Generate Random Maze To start, we need a maze. And honestly manually draw maze is pretty painful, therefore we are going to generate one randomly.
